comments:
3.0 M7

- ran RCP browser example in target
- made a code change
- got the usual prompt that the change couldn't be applied to the running app
- I believe I terminated the target in response to this.
- log got the following stack traces
- there was 1 occurrence of the first, then several occurrences of the 2nd 
interspersed with several occurrences of the 3rd

I had a single breakpoint set in a different plugin than the browser example 
(which had been hit once).
I unchecked this plugin to remove it from the launch config.
Not sure if I did this before or after making the code change and terminating 
the target.
Uneccessary error logging - attempting an HCR when the VM terminates.
